details.description:
List Broker deployments for the tenant

#### Required permissions

- `View Tenant Details (tenant.read)`

parameters.description: Number of results to return per page
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: The requested version of the endpoint to process the request
parameters.name: version

200.description: Returns the list of Broker deployments by install ID

deprecation.description:
The deprecation date of the underlying endpoint. For more information, please refer to the deprecation header RFC:
https://tools.ietf.org/id/draft-dalal-deprecation-header-01.html

details.description:
List Broker deployments for a given install ID

#### Required permissions

- `View Tenant Details (tenant.read)`

parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: The requested version of the endpoint to process the request
parameters.name: version
